overview: It takes real balls to cold call on strangers and tell them all about your faith and spiritual beliefs – and this bunch of proselytising beauties have got plenty of cock to go with it! Lads like Mark Fontana, whose method of converting the sinful souls of Prague involves using every inch of meat between his legs – not to mention his pert, dick-hungry ass. And when there’s no-one around to convert, there’s an eternal stream of fellow devotees; as Connor Rex, Zac Law and Lucas Drake cum together to worship at the altar of hard cock, with a baptism of spunk guaranteed every time! Being saved has never looked hotter!
title: When the Bells Ring
